<Extension()> Public Function InitTokenCacheAsync (provider As MsalProvider, storageProperties As StorageCreationProperties, Optional logger As TraceSource = Nothing) As Task

Docs.param: The instance of to init the cache for.

Docs.summary: Helper function to initialize the token cache for non-UWP apps. MSAL handles this automatically on UWP.
Docs.returns: A representing the result of the asynchronous operation.
